fr.jweb.app.mbeans

Class DatabaseManagerMB

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.jweb.app.mbeans.DatabaseManagerMB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DatabaseManagerMB
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    DatabaseManager ManagedBean Handle the connection with the database Contain the DAO for each entities : News, Product, Review, User
